item.title: Kodaline - All I Want
item.description:
Ukulele play along
All I Want - Kodaline
Using the chords: Am C Dm F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU (fast)
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Huey Lewis & The News - Stuck With You
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Keys of C & D.
Chords Used: C, Am7, F, Dm, G, Am, Em, A, D, Bm7
As performed by Huey Lewis and the News.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/FaNEwVl1sR0
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Joe Brown - Joe Brown - I'll See You In My Dreams - Jools Holland - 2008_UGC
item.description:
**NOT FOR BEGINNERS**
I'll See You In My Dreams by Joe Brown And The Bruvvers. For educational use. Chords Used: A7, Am, Bb, Bb6, Bb6-2, Bbm6, Bbmaj7, C, C7, Cm6, Cmaj7, D, D7, D7-2, D7(HI), D9, Dm, E7, E7-2, Edim, Em7, F, F/C, F6, F6-5, F7, Fmaj7, G7 (yes, this song uses 28 chords). The video is from YouTuber Elisa M. and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWERLNXIZGc. The chord progressions I used were heavily inspired by Jim’s Ukulele Songbook, which may be found at https://ozbcoz.com/Songs/downloadpdf.php?ID=3748%2Csongbook&fbclid=IwAR2UAs9814iikntmCk_pnDdsa9bE964sFKWluY5DTEEr4dIH5qDr2sdSB50 .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Glee Cast - Somebody That I Used To Know
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Somebody That I Used To Know - Gotye (feat. Kimbra)
Using the chords: Bb C Dm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or D XU D XU (X=chuck)
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Sarah Jeffery - Queen of Mean
item.description:
Queen of Mean from Descendants 3. It’s been raised by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. It’s just the first part of the song, and it is abruptly cut off at the key change. For educational use. Chords Used: Am F G Dm
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Katy Perry - Roar
item.description:
Roar by Katy Perry. It’s been lowered by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C Dm Am F G
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Billie Eilish - i love you
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Easy
I Love You - Billie Eilish
Using the chords: Am Cmaj7 Dm F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or single strums
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Toon Tunes - The Flintstones
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C (Transposed down from the original).
Chords Used: G, C, Dm7, D7, G7, Dm, Em, F, E7, A7, Am7, Fm
The theme song from The Flintstones.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/SxhKRWp3zx0
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6

item.title: Rihanna - Stay
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Stay on the ukulele by Rihanna. The chords used are C F G Am Dm.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Lewis Capaldi - Someone You Loved
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. Transposed down a half step from the original.
Chords Used: C, G, Am, F, Dm
As performed by Lewis Capaldi
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/Y8Wdenl8bD8
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion video is from churchmediadrop.com
